Question
========

A researcher asks people to keep track of whether they traveled to 
work by bicycle, public transport, or car during their workdays for 
a month. This is an example of

Answerlist
----------

* categorical measurement
* disjunct measurement
* quantitative measurement

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* categorical measurement: Correct
* disjunct measurement: Incorrect
* quantitative measurement: Incorrect
